column2: A few women have joined your inner circle, and have become devout worshippers of the Dark Lord!

column2: There's no time to enjoy your little creature before a huge sense of emptiness hits you. Within you, you know that this might be the last of your children …
column6: Neanche il tempo di gioire della tua piccola creatura che un enorme senso di vuoto t'assale. Dentro di te, sai che questo potrebbe essere l'ultimo dei tuoi figli...

column2: Your spouse has died. When Elves marry each other, they link their spirits, their feas, to each other. Thus, Elves normally cannot remarry, even after the death or dissapearance of their spouse.
column3: Lorsqu'un elfe se marie, il lie son esprit à celui de son nouveau conjoint. Ainsi, il ne peut plus se remarier, même une fois que son conjoint disparait.
Nos esprits sont liés pour toujours.
column6: I nostri spiriti saranno collegati per sempre.

column2: If Finwë could remarry, so could I!
There's no time to enjoy your little creature before a huge sense of emptiness hits you. Within you, you know that this might be the last of your children...
Thanks to your advanced years, your childbearning days are over.
Perhaps I'll have more crafting time.
Although blessed beyond the years of lesser women, you are now old enough that your childbearing days are over.
